part.narration: Yuki and Nozomi stand in the front yard of the apartment building.
part.line: There's my girl, looking like some sort of adult.
If you want a job, then follow me.
part.narration: Nozomi marches forward, Yuki following. Yuki hears a faint clash.
part.line: Hey! What's going on over there?
part.narration: Nozomi dashes forward. Yuki follows. Stop. Before Yuki's Eyes is an industrial-strength hydraulic crusher. Stop. It slams foreign objects dead.
Nozomi turns around. Yuki looks down and kicks at the ground.
Nozomi walks through and emerges unharmed.

The hydraulic crusher accelerates. The din grinds at Yuki's ears. Yuki's skull. Yuki's brain.The camera closes up on Yuki, to the point of the Player being unable to see the top half of the crusher smashing the bottom. The Player will just have to hope the crusher doesn't comem when having Yuki cross.

Yuki hauls ass through the crusher. She trips. She lands on her back. Control lost.Ramp up the sound. The controls fly around between random places on the screen.For her last trick, Yuki cowers like the failure she is. Like the dropout she is. Like the ill-mannered, illiterate, wrong-haired misfit she is. The crusher then prepares for execution. It ascends into the heavens in its procedure to eliminate all foreign matter, and then— nothing. Yuki looks up. Nothing! The crusher fades from mind. Its dissonance is but the clamor of adolescents in the distance.
part.line: Christ, were you always this scared of people?
part.narration: Nozomi nears Yuki, folds her arms, and taps her foot. Yuki lowers her volume.
part.line: If I get too friendly with those kids, they'll think I'm a pedophile.
Nonsense, you're beautiful and everyone loves you and they love your eyes—
part.narration: Nozomi grabs Yuki by the wrist and drags her towards the crowd. The crowd seems to be cheering for someone. Yuki tenses. The heels of her shoes scrape across the concrete. The oh-so-courteous Nozomi lets Yuki get first blood. She flings her into the crowd. Yuki bumps into a boy. The boy stares at Yuki. Silence. As the moment becomes increasingly awkward, interface elements begin to fade from the screen, eventually leaving only one: The talk button. The Player will know what to do.Yuki crooked halfway smiles.
The butterflies fly away. Yuki actually smiles.All of the interface elements come back.The boy smiles back.
part.line: Nothing much. What's everyone doing over here?
part.narration: A child and old man together play some sort of competitive puzzle game about blobs on some sort of two-screened handheld. The young adults cheer.
part.line: Mess him up, Taro! Kazuma's got nothing on you!
I've got a thousand Yen riding on you, Taro!
I thought we were going to play vanilla.
New dogs have to learn new tricks sometime—
part.narration: Kazuma grins and clenches his fists.
Half the crowd cheers. Yuki cheers! The battle rages on.
part.line: Whose side are you on, big girl? The young or the elderly?

choice.narration: Someone wins. All is quiet. The Kazuma fans look on in shock. Taro drops his handheld and begins to dance. Applause. Kazuma smiles.
Kazuma gives back to a child the borrowed handheld. Exit the young Truants, cheering for Taro.

choice.line: Oh my, looks like we've got a rebel!
choice.narration: Someone wins. All is quiet. The Taro fans look on in shock. Kazuma holds out his hands. The Taro fans unload their dough. Applause. Taro frowns.
choice.line: Lighten up! Just have your people call my people and we'll set up another game.
choice.narration: Kazuma gives back to a child the borrowed handheld. Exit the young Truants, waving bye to Kazuma.

part.narration: An immovable grin is plastered on Yuki's face. She jumps up and down and huffs and puffs and clasps her hands together and yells:
part.line: That was fun! I didn't die! Is it always like this?
part.narration: Yuki looks at the sign next to Kazuma. It reads:
part.line: Will beat you at games for food
Young Pomme! Come to challenge me to a round of Puyo?
No time— I have a job interview!
part.narration: Yuki marches forward, Nozomi following. Yuki keeps walking.Don't notify the Player upon reaching the destination, allow them to continue walking until they notice Nozomi is gone. When nearing Nozomi once again, progress. If the Player knows the area of Japan well, they may realize the only game company building in the area and stop before triggering the point. If so, Yuki laughs.Yuki runs back over to Nozomi. Nozomi points up.
part.line: Let's go in and chat up the boss.
